1: -module(api_handler_SUITE).
    2: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    3: 
    4: -export([all/0]).
    5: -export([basic_handle/1]).
    6: 
    7: -record(state, {}).
    8: 
    9: all() -> [basic_handle].
   10: 
   11: basic_handle("") ->
   12: 
   13:     SimplifiedReq = {http_req,<<"GET">>,'HTTP/1.1'},
   14:     State = #state{},
   15:     meck:new(cowboy_req),
   16:     meck:expect(cowboy_req, reply, fun(200, Headers, Body, Req) -> {ok, Req} end),
   17: 
   18:     Response = diversity_api_handler:handle(SimplifiedReq, State),
   19:     Response =:= {ok, SimplifiedReq, State},
   20:     meck:unload(cowboy_req).
